metadata.dcterms:title: Dataset for "Drought stress leads to systemic induced susceptibility to a nectrotrophic fungus associated with mountain pine beetle in Pinus banksiana seedlings"
metadata.dcterms:creator: Klutsch, Jennifer
metadata.dcterms:description: This dataset is from a study that investigated the impact of drought on induced defenses from initial attack and resistance to subsequent biotic attacks in greenhouse grown jack pine seedlings.
metadata.dcterms:subject: Medicine, Health and Life Sciences
defense chemistry
Dendroctonus ponderosae
plant-microbe interactions
